scripts.build-parcel: mkdir -p dist && cp dev/index.html dist/ && spago bundle --bundle-type app --outfile dist/index.js && parcel build dist/index.html --public-url /app/
scripts.build-webpack: mkdir -p dist && cp dev/index.html dist/ && spago bundle --bundle-type app --outfile dist/index.js && parcel build dist/index.html --public-url /app/
